skin.screen:
{"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (2, 2), size = (140, 96), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 2), size = (1400, 36), font=0, color=0x3faaff, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 35), size = (600, 34), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (800, 35), size = (600, 34), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 66), size = (600, 34), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (800, 66), size = (600, 34), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (1560, 40), font=2, color=0x3faaff, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 45), size = (1560, 40), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 32),gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular", 30),gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 100 }
# fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing, currently there is no other way doing this.

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (550, 36), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (580, 2), size = (250, 36), flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (850, 5), size = (150, 30), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1020, 2), size = (180, 36), flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 40 }
